name: Work With Me Here
description:
Having to work at home during the pandemic isn't supposed to be exciting, but for Toffee the Dog it is! Master is home all day!

"YAY! I want to play! But he keeps staring at that screen instead of me :C Maybe if I cause trouble he'll play with me... I know! I'll chew on that wire he doesn't like me touching!"

Get through the work day answering calls, replying to emails, and checking documents while keeping Toffee from pulling the router plug.

TEAM TOFFEE IS
  • Gabby
  • Justin
  • Bruno
  • James
  • Oliver
  • Yahel
